sense.def: Pathological Condition of a huang dan 黃疸 , yellow dan -illness, with the entire body assuming a deep yellow color, accompanied by a desire to sleep and an inability to speak, weakness of the four extremities, and spitting of sticky saliva. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 61: 癇黃， 病患身如金色，不多言語，四肢無力，好眠臥，口吐粘涎者，宜服茵陳 湯方 , “ Epilepsy jaundice : patients have a body the color of gold. They do not speak much. Their four limbs have no strength. They love to lie down and sleep. From their mouth they spit a sticky saliva. In such cases the recipe to ingest the decoction with yin chen is advisable”.
